Location: PingPong Room, Floor 13

After exploring what's possible with the 'Feel â†’ Think â†’ Act' framework, we're now focusing on future opportunities and practical applications to scale Network School.â€‹Topics we'll cover:â€‹Emerging GenAI trends in text, audio, video, and roboticsâ€‹Economistâ€™s view: GenAI costs, Production Possibility Frontier, and Perez's Tech Revolutionsâ€‹Key updates from Leopold Aschenbrennerâ€™s 2024 "Situational Awareness" reportâ€‹Future of work: risks and opportunitiesâ€‹Shifting from traditional to AI-driven economyâ€‹Importance of human agency in an AI worldâ€‹Practical strategies for using GenAI to enhance community, learning, and operational efficiencyâ€‹Join us for insights, discussion, and action-oriented ideas!P.S. Title: Himalayan Kriya Yoga
Hosts: Yana Kultysheva
Date and Time: Wednesday 12 March at 10:30 - 11:30
Location: Floor 3 near the Gym
Description: â€‹Himalayan Kriya Yogais a form of energy yoga. Its practice is similar to Kundalini Yoga, Tai Chi, and Qi Gong, but itâ€™s more raw, primal, and dynamic. Instead of the usual yoga poses on a mat, weâ€™ll be moving, shaking, breathing, and tapping to get your energy flowing. In Kriya, each part of the body stores certain unprocessed emotions and blockages, and weâ€™ll be releasing them one by one.â€‹â€‹â€‹The movements are simple and intuitiveâ€”no experience needed. Itâ€™s a great way to relax, boost your energy, and shake off any post-workout tension.
Attendees: 4 Going

Hosts: TeyaNetwork SchoolEden
Date and Time: Wednesday 12 March at 12:00 - 13:30
Location: pingpong, hotel lv 13
Description: â€‹ğŸŒŸAre you new to meditation or a seasoned meditator who has been practicing a particular style most of the time? Or something in between?â€‹âœ¨In all of those cases, there are differentmeditation practicesandstrategiesyou can learn about, that target your specific needs and goals, if you want to be an informed meditator.â€‹âœ¨During this hands-on workshop we will learn aboutMeditation Styles, and most importantly, discover the style that will be most beneficial for you, be it:â€‹FOCUSâ€‹Makes you feel clear, sharp, stable, productive, and effectiveâ€‹MINDFULNESSâ€‹Makes you feel calm, centered, and peacefulâ€‹OPEN HEARTâ€‹Makes you feel open, loving, joyful, gratefulâ€‹QUIET MINDâ€‹Makes you feel mental calmness, serenity, pure awarenessâ€‹Looking forward to seeing at the workshop and making discoveries together! ğŸ’«

Title: Junto: The Future
Hosts: Hithesh ShajiNetwork School
Date and Time: Friday 14 March at 20:30 - 21:30
Location: Forest City Marina HotelJalan Forest City - Lebuhraya Tanjung Pelepas, 1, Pulau Satu, 81550 Gelang Patah, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
Description: â€‹â€‹Junto Topicâ€‹There are several visions of the future such as techno-optimism, decelerationism, accelerationism, digital minimalism, etc. This junto will be about speculating on the future and discussing which vision is the most probable and which is most preferable.â€‹â€‹What is a Junto?â€‹â€‹Benjamin Franklin founded the Junto Club as a way to discuss morals, politics, and natural philosophy to improve themselves and their community. The club was initially composed of twelve members who met on Friday evenings.â€‹â€‹Our debates were to be conducted in the sincere spirit of inquiry after truth, without fondness for dispute or desire of victory. -Benjamin Franklinâ€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹Who should attend?â€‹â€‹Juntos are an opportunity to learn more about the chosen topic and get insights into how other people understand it. The juntos I am hosting will be about how one can improve themselves using technology (AI, Crypto, Health tech etc.) and how we can improve the internet frontier (our community).â€‹â€‹This event will be capped at 8 people so that it doesnâ€™t become a public debate. People with the following characteristics would enjoy this event:â€‹â€‹Insatiable curiosityâ€‹â€‹Truth over egoâ€‹â€‹Strong opinions, weakly heldâ€‹â€‹Vigor to get things done
Attendees: Unknown attendance
